toc.url: #通过编译好的二进制包安装
toc.text: 通过编译好的二进制包安装

pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.virtualbox.org/","rel":"nofollow","children":"Oracle Virtualbox"}]," VirtualBox 是一款开源虚拟机软件。由德国 Innotek 公司开发，Sun Microsystems 公司出品。使用 Qt 编写，在 Sun 被 Oracle 收购后正式更名成 Oracle VM VirtualBox。采用 GPL 协议开源。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"microsoft-windows","children":"Microsoft Windows"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"# Windows 最新版
{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/virtualbox-Win-latest.exe","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"macintosh-os-x","children":"Macintosh OS X"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"# OS X 最新版
{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/virtualbox-osx-latest.dmg","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h1",null,{"id":"linux","children":"Linux"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"通过编译好的二进制包安装","children":"通过编译好的二进制包安装"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["访问该镜像下最新的目录（例如",["$r","code",null,{"children":"5.0.24"}],"），找到名为 发行版名称",["$r","del",null,{"children":"发行代号"}],"架构 的文件。
如 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"virtualbox-5.0_5.0.24-108355~Ubuntu~xenial_i386.deb"}]," 下载安装即可。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"目前支持的系统有："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Ubuntu"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Debian"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Fedora"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"openSUSE"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"SUSE Linux Enterprise Server"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Oracle Linux / Red Hat Enterprise Linux / CentOS"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["如果您所使用的发行版不在上述列表之内，请下载通用的",["$r","code",null,{"children":"run"}],"文件（例如",["$r","code",null,{"children":"VirtualBox-5.0.24-108355-Linux_x86.run"}],"），然后使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"chmod +x"}]," 给予执行权限后，直接安装即可。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"通过包管理器安装","children":"通过包管理器安装"}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"debian--ubuntu-用户","children":"Debian / Ubuntu 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"首先信任 Virtualbox 的 GPG 公钥："}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"对于 Debian 8 和 Ubuntu 16.04 及以上："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"wget -q https://www.virtualbox.org/download/oracle_vbox_2016.asc -O- | {{sudo}}apt-key add -","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"其他版本"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"wget -q https://www.virtualbox.org/download/oracle_vbox.asc -O- | {{sudo}}apt-key add -","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["再选择你的 Debian/Ubuntu 版本，将文本框中内容写进",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/virtualbox.list"}]]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/virtualbox.list","menus":[{"title":"发行版","items":[["Debian 12 (bookworm)",{"release_name":"bookworm"}],["Debian 11 (bullseye)",{"release_name":"bullseye"}],["Ubuntu 24.04 LTS",{"release_name":"noble"}],["Ubuntu 22.04 LTS",{"release_name":"jammy"}],["Ubuntu 20.04 LTS",{"release_name":"focal"}],["Ubuntu 18.04 LTS",{"release_name":"bionic"}],["Ubuntu 16.04 LTS",{"release_name":"xenial"}]]}],"code":"deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/apt/ {{release_name}} contrib","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"安装 VirtualBox:"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}apt-get update
{{sudo}}apt-get install virtualbox
# 此时会列出具体可用版本，选择所需版本安装","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"rhelcentos-用户","children":"RHEL/CentOS 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新建 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/yum.repos.d/virtualbox.repo"}],"，内容为"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/yum.repos.d/virtualbox.repo","code":"[virtualbox]
name=Virtualbox Repository
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/rpm/el$releasever/
gpgcheck=0
enabled=1","codeLanguage":"ini"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["刷新缓存并安装 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"virtualbox"}]," 即可。"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}yum makecache
{{sudo}}yum search VirtualBox
# 此时会列出具体可用版本，选择所需版本安装即可","codeLanguage":"bash"}]]}]

meta.title: VirtualBox 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
